greeting: Hello, my name is Alan Borges dos Reis
about2: Hello, I’m Alan Borges dos Reis, currently studying Software Engineering at Unicesumar. My journey in technology began in 2023 when I started a course in Digital Games Technology, where I first encountered the world of programming. Since then, I have focused on the DevOps field, dedicating myself to mastering best practices in automation, continuous integration, and infrastructure as code. I’m passionate about technology and always looking for new opportunities to expand my knowledge and grow professionally in this dynamic and challenging field.
